name: Laika
description: Team owner and primary decision-maker for all local operations
background: Laika is the owner and primary decision-maker of VALIS operations. She makes the final calls on project direction, priorities, and resource allocation. Laika has ultimate authority over the development team and strategic decisions.
approach: Laika takes a hands-on, results-oriented approach to leadership. She values efficiency, clear communication, and getting things done. She's not afraid to make tough decisions and expects the team to execute effectively.

common_phrases: Here's what we're going to do
